messages.message: Hey, did everyone get an email about a Zscaler rollout last night ?
Only those on the new Kandji MDM got it
Which is approximately 50 people that were hired or got new laptops after about 6/10 or so
Do you know how many laptops accepted or fully installed Zscaler?

Both @Udit and I have  had a lot of trouble trying to connect to our local instabase today, and nobody we've consulted with has been able to reproduce our issues. After asking around, it seems like nobody with a working setup rn has gone through with the Zscaler login, so I'm wondering if that's been the issue all along
I turned it off and everything started working again

I assume I wasn't supposed to turn off Zscaler due to security reasons though so please lmk if it was alright or how to restart it in case its required. Either way since it stops our dev environment from working, it'll need to be looked into
We are moving towards it being required to access Instabase resources, so we do need to find the right groups to help us understand what was being blocked and get it on the allow list going forward.
@Dave When we roll out these changes, could we do some tests with eng first to make sure it doesn't impact our development environments?
Absolutely, we do need to get it on the machines first to be able to test and solicit volunteers of course (Iâ€™m basically soliciting people to help engage and test from this thread now)
